professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in performance tuning, backup/recovery, upgrades, and database administration across various environments.

key_responsibilities: Monitored and tuned long-running jobs using application development teams and analysis tools.
Configured backups and monitored database health through regular performance tuning.
Performed upgrades from Oracle 10g to 12c and applied quarterly patches.
and performed replication using RMAN and Datapump utilities.
Implemented Transportable Tablespaces (TTS) for data movement between databases.
Provided 24/7 support and configured Flash Recovery Area.
Supported database operations across various systems.
Assisted with performance optimization and backup strategies.
Contributed to system upgrades and maintenance.
Administered Oracle databases across multiple platforms.
Assisted with system expansion and database optimization.

technical_skills:
Oracle Database Administration",
            "Database Performance Tuning",
            "Backup and Recovery Solutions",
            "System Upgrade and Maintenance",
            "Data Replication Strategies",
            "Transportable Tablespaces Implementation
tools_and_software:
Oracle 10g, 11g, 12c",
            "RMAN (Recovery Manager)",
            "Datapump Utility",
            "TKPROF (Toolkit for Performance Analysis)",
            "Flash Recovery Area Configuration
